hero.title: Hi, I'm Carlos
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineering Graduate
hero.description: With experience in Frontend development, eager to apply my skills in new projects while expanding my knowledge.

about.title: About Me
about.descriptionp1: I'm a driven developer who thrives under pressure and fully commits to projects I'm passionate about. Quality is non-negotiable—I’d rather work through the night than deliver something subpar.
about.descriptionp2: While my core strengths lie in full-stack and backend development, I excel at quickly learning and adapting to new technologies. My coding journey began with Minecraft command blocks, sparking a passion that led me to explore programming in depth.
about.descriptionp3: I value self-reliance and efficient solutions, believing the best approach is often to dive in and adapt along the way. Beyond coding, I enjoy football and gaming, but my ultimate ambition is to build impactful projects and eventually launch my own company.
about.description1: Completed at ISEC in Coimbra, Portugal, providing a strong foundation in programming, software development, data structures, and algorithms, equipping students for success in the tech industry.
about.description2: Worked at CO2Offset, a startup focused on reducing carbon footprints. Developed a web app with React.js, Vite, and Chakra UI, integrating blockchain for transparent carbon emission tracking and offsetting.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.212: Identifying issues and finding creative solutions
skills.222: Collaborating with others to achieve common goals

skills.242: Adjusting to new conditions and challenges
skills.262: Maintaining focus and productivity under stress

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each one represents different skills and technologies I've mastered.
projects.explorer: A transparent blockchain explorer for tracking carbon offset initiatives on Hedera Hashgraph. Built for CO2Offset, to provide transparency to everyone.
projects.betwise: A betting platform that fetches games via external APIs, offering a zero-house-edge model with auto-adjusting odds based on supply and demand. Supports user logins and secure cookies.
projects.pos: A software designed for small businesses. Provides an easy-to-use interface for managing products, sales, clients and more.
projects.disputed: Disputed! is a 1v1 debate game (best of 3) where AI scores arguments to determine the winner. Built fullstack with Next.js, Express, and MongoDB, it features NextAuth authentication, WebSocket communication (Socket.IO), integrated AI and automated CI/CD.
projects.gamezone: A website with some JavaScript-powered games, playable instantly in the browser—no downloads needed.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or just want to connect? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
contact.warning: The contact form is currently disabled due to GitHub Pages limitations. Please reach out via email or social media instead.
